content: नियुक्त {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Directed, ordered, instructed, commanded. {@--2@} Authorised, appointed. {@--3@} Permitted to raise issue; see नियोग (7) below {@--4@} Attached to. {@--5@} Fastened to. {@--6@} Ascertained. {@--7@} Prompted, incited. --क्तः A functionary, an officer, any one charged with some business.
